textBeforeTable: Model Measurements US sizes. Sizes listed are Size & Fit Length: 34in / 86.5cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Imported, China. Dry clean. Skirt lining: 100% polyester. Bodice lining: 92% silk/8% spandex. Trim: 100% silk. Shell: 100% polyester. Fabric: Textured weave. An impressionist swirl of vivid colors looks playful and bold on a fit-and-flare dress from alice + olivia. Double-layered, underwire cups and flexible boning structure the fitted bodice, and elastic panels frame the exposed back zip. The halter neckline ties in the back, and the skirt gains lively movement from the mesh-trimmed lining. Description Dresses > Clothing > alice + olivia >

If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer The alice + olivia clothing collection was born of designer Stacey Bendet's personal quest to create the perfect pair of flattering, formfitting pants. Her now-signature style was an instant success, and "Stacey Pants" quickly became a daily staple for the retro sophisticate. Through the years, the ladylike charm and instant allure of alice + olivia apparel has made the label into a go-to brand for vintage style.
